1.content:
As the water Wash over your body, Tyler wakes up on the shore. He couphed and spat out salt water, he shakes his head to get the sand out of his eyes, he crawled up the Sandy Beach and stood up. Dazed and confused He suddenly felt a sharp pain on his head, he placed his hand on his forhead and down there was little blood on it.

He most have hit his head pretty hard, all he could remember is that he was sailing in the middle of the ocean and there was this storm. The waves ware so strong it twist and turned over the boat banged my head in the process.

Tyler looked at his surroundings, on the sides of him there were these endless shorelines, large Sea Rock's, in the front of him was a thick tropical Forest it was obvious he was on some uncharted island. Tyler decide's rather he should explore the island's forest or stay on the beach. With a little time thinking he decide's to?
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
With little thinking, Tyler decided to explore the Forest.

Tyler started hiking into the forest the site was beautiful, There were palm trees, palm fronds, small river's.

As Tyler hiked deeper into the vest forest, in about an hour or so he came across?
11.title: Explore the forest

111.content:
As Tyler continued hiking through the forest, he saw a light at the end of the forest. Tyler new it was the exit out of the forest, so he ran out towards light and exited the forest and into a wide open field.

You was relieved when you finally got out of forest, but the relief was short lived as you looked out into the opened field, your eyes went wide in shock as he saw a crowd various monsters GIANT ones.

You couldn’t believe your eyes, there were hundreds of them, you wondered just how big this island was to house such giant beings.

They were all Anthropomorphic or humanoid in Appearance and hundreds of feet tall, they seemed to come from various species.

They all seemed to be normally socializing with each other, like talking, walking from all directions, some just hanging out in groups or by themselves. Just like being in a park just daily activities.

You were scared and thought about running back into the forest, but also amazed by the site of these monsters, you thought of getting a closer look of these great giants but that would be risk of being spotted or you can stay right were you are and observe from a distance.

You decided to?
111.title: A open field

1113.content:
Out of amazement and curiosity Tyler wanted to get a closer look at these amazing giant's.

As you looked around the field to see if there was a way to get closer to the monster's without being seen, he spotted a few patches of trees, bushes, shrubs, scattered around the field.

You saw a pile of bushes down a steep Hill you slide down the hill and into the bushes and took cover, you poke your head up and saw another pile bushes a couple feet away.

You jump out of the bushes and ran into the next pile of bushes and the same to the next, as you got closer to these giant being's you can actually hear them chatter and feel the ground shake as there feet make loud crashing thud's as they walked, you make a final run towards rather small pile of bushes that was sitting next to a tree.

As you take cover in the small bushes, you peak out and observe these giant amazing creatures.

The first thing you spot were two male insect like monster's chatting with each other, one looks like a wasp. He has four arms, wings, two digitigrade legs, larg abdomen like stinger. The other looks like spider but it wasn't just a spider his upper body looks humanoid and the lower part of his body is a immense spider, Tyler's eyes widened it couldn't be, it was a Drider. A Centaur like creature from the video game dungeons and dragons, but this was no dark elf/drow, this drider was different his whole body was covered in black fur, his humanoid half had four arms and three fingers, his face had four eyes, his mouth was full of sharp teeth and fangs, both monster's stood the same height like around 200 feet tall.

You looked around and saw a group of anthro dinosaur's on the right there were four of them, one a T-Rex, one a spinosaurus, one a triceratops, the tallest one was the brontosaurus. The triceratops and the brontosaurus were male and the T-Rex and the spinosaurus were female, you guessed there height's the tallest was the bronto that stand at 400 feet tall, the Rex was 250 feet tall, the triceratops was 200 feet tall, just a little shorter then the Rex, shortest was the spino that stood 100 feet.

You looked Around and saw other monster's some of them you recognize frome you're favorite video game "like the "Nargacuga" and the "Barioth" from "Monster Hunter", for starters. Others were Anthropomorphic animals, mythical creatures, and all kinds.

You dive back down into the bushes, the site of these giant creatures were fascinating, suddenly the ground started to shake and hear a loud rumbling footsteps.

You peak out of the bushes and saw a monster was heading towards your direction.

The giant monster was?
1113.title: Getting a closer look

11133.content: The monster's from monster Hunter?
11133.title: Other

choices: Stay and observe the other monster's
111331.content:
As you peaked out of the bushes and saw that the giant monster heading towards you was indeed a anthro Nargacuga.

But this one wasn’t the one you recognize from the video games, this one had slight changes. It had dark blue-ish fur and his underbelly was white, it’s pointy ears were a little longer kinda bat like, wings on it’s arms, it’s body shape was slim a little athletic, and it was definitely a male as you can see his sheath and balls between his legs. You looked up at his face, the expression on his face looked calm/relaxed with a hint of boredom, you guess his size and height he looked to be at least 200 feet tall.

He doesn’t seemed to notice you as he was looking straight forward.

His rumbling foot steps was making the ground shake with loud crashing thuds...THUD...THUD...THUD...as he got closer. You couldn’t move as you’re body was frozen in fear, but you soon realized that it was already to late as nargacuga already had one giant scaly foot right above you. Time seemed to stand still for a moment as you can see and observe every detail of the foot's underside, it looked firm/calloused to a degree but still looked strangely soft with small wrinkles, and slightly dirty.

As time returned to normal, the giant foot slowly continued downward's towards the bushes you were hiding in, in fear of being crushed your body had finally kicked into high gear and dashed out of the bushes In time as the giant scaly foot crashed down upon the bushes you were hiding in.

As the foot lifted, you saw that the bushes you ware ones hiding in was crushed flattened inside a bus sized foot print, You gasp for breath as you were lucky you didn’t end up crushed.

As Nargacuga continued walking forward, you Looking at his backside you saw his tail swishing from side to side and below his tail was his big well sculpt butt.
you couldn't help but blush a little as you stare at those perfectly round cheeks of his "damn he's thick" you blurted out.

You make a choice to follow after nargacuga or you can stay and observe the other monster's.

you chose?
111331.title: Nargacuga

1113311.content:
You were to fascinated with the nargacuga you decided fallow after him, as you looked around to make sure no other monsters was watching you hopped out of the bushes and ran after nargacuga who since disappeared into the forest. But that wasn’t a problem, all you have to do is fellow his giant footprints that he left leading into the forest.

After fellowing the footprints for minutes through the forest, it led to a more secluded part of the island. You finally managed to catch up to nargacuga and saw that he was?
1113311.title: Follow Nargacuga

11133111.content:
As you were catching up with nargacuga, you soon discovered a large cave big enough to be used as a shelter or home for these giant creatures. As you come closer to the huge cave you could here the distant snoring coming from inside, you carefully sneak inside.

As you walk deeper in the cave the snoring seemed to get a little louder witch means nargacuga must be close, you continued on and finally found what you were looking for.

Nargacuga was lying on his stomach his legs out stretched, his head resting on his folded arms, he appears to be in deep sleep as you walk up to him. The first thing you come in contact with was his feet, you walk up to one of his feet and suddenly a slight cheesy aroma assaults your nostrils.

The scent wasn’t as bad as you thought, it was actually quite pleasant, as you Examine the dark grey leathery humanoid foot it was slightly dirty and it appeared strangely soft and glistening with little sweat. You reached a hand out and pressed a hand into the ball of the foot beneath the toes, your hand Sinked into the soft flesh it felt like a pillow it was literally that soft.

You placed both hands on the ball of the foot and pressed down into the soft flesh, squeezing it, and rubbing it, the feeling was incredible, but as you did this, the foot started to move and with. You quickly step back from the foot, as you saw the clawed toes wiggle slightly and herd nargacuga let out a low chuckle.

He seemed to be enjoying the little massage you were giving him, this made you smile. But should I continue with his feet or should explore the rest of his body?
11133111.title: Asleep in a cave

111331112.content:
You decide to explore his body a little more, as you walk to the right side of his body passed his feet and continue pass his legs.

As you get to his hips, you stopped for minute and gaze at his well sculpted bubble butt. You always admired his cute butt when you first saw them bouncing and jiggling while nargacuga was walking away.

You decided to climb his hips by grabbed a piece of his furry flesh and hoist yourself up, as you climbed the fleshy wall of the giant anthro wyvern you hear him start chuckling again as your little movement’s were tickling him.

As you made it to the top of nargacuga’s right butt cheek, you stand there and feel your feet sink into the soft flesh, telling you exackly that he still has some fat stored in his butt. You get down on to your hands and knees and started Pushing, rubbing, and squeezing the furry flesh, it felt incredible, the flesh was so soft and squishy. As you did this you hear nargacuga humming in pleasure, he was definitely enjoying this.

After minutes of massaging, you stopped and lay back into soft furry flesh exhausted, it felt like you were laying on a very soft bed. As you lay there, the whole fleshy surface you were laying on started to move “what...the!” was the only thing you uttered out as you sat up.

Narga’s tail lifted casting a large shadow over you and started to wagged slowly, then you hear him let out a yawn while stretching His limbs, you suddenly realize that nargacuga was waking up.

Nargacuga the 200 feet tall giant anthro Wyvern on the other hand, was just waking up from his slumber he yawned and stretched his limbs, he opened his golden yellow cat eyes and smirked. Nargacuga loved taking short naps it was like his daily routine sometimes, but that’s when he suddenly felt something on his behind, “...Hmm?...” still a little groggy he turned his head back and saw what appears to be a small human sitting on his right butt cheak.

You were sitting there frozen in fear as you saw nargacuga turn his head to look at you, after a short time lived nargacuga suddenly broke the silence and spoke.

“Hello human” he appeared soft spoken “you mind telling me what are you doing In my home, and why are you sitting on my buttock’s?” he questioned you.

Tyler was speechless and dumbfounded at nargacuga’s divine intelligence and soft spoken tone of his voice, as he asked you some questions.

“What’s the matter human?” He said “Cats got your tongue” nargacuga chuckled at his little joke.

Tyler was still a little frightened and speechless, he started to back up a bit, nargacuga notice this and said “relax human I have no attention to harm you” he said with a comforting small closed smile.

This gave Tyler some courage as you stood up and look at the friendly anthro wyvern and said, “um...thank you for having no attention to hurt me, my name is Tyler and I was shipwrecked on this island not to long ago”. You confidently told nargacuga.

“And the reason you were sitting on my buttocks?” Nargacuga ask you curiously.

“Oh...well” you answered nervously “well...i wanted to get your attention, so I...ah..decided climb to the top of your buttocks and give you a little rub. You said with a half honest answer, not revealing the real reason why you were massage his attractive ass.

“Oh...so that was you” nargacuga said with a smile, “so your the one responsible for that amazing feeling on my buttocks...huh. Tell you what Tyler I was enjoying the little massage you were giving me, if you continue massaging my buttocks i’ll Tell you everything you need to know about this island and it’s inhabitants, you don’t mind do you?

Tyler couldn’t believe it, here he is shipwrecked on a island inhabited by giant monsters and lucky enough to meat one that is friendly and intelligent.

“Um...sure thing nargacuga I don’t mind at all” Tyler said.

Nargacuga smiled and lay his head back down on his folded arms, “thanks Tyler, and by the way call me Narga for short”.

“Ok...narga” as both of you finish talking. Tyler got on his knees and continue massaging narga’s butt, rubbing and squeezing the soft furry flesh.

Narga in the meantime, has closed his eyes and started humming in pleasure, as you continue massage him.
111331112.title: Explore his body

1113311121.content:
Some time later when night fell.

Narga sure didn’t mind you building a small camp fire between them, nerga sense gotten into a comfortable position, lying on the side of his body, head resting on his hand.

You on the other hand, sat Indian style on the opposite side of the fire.

Ready to have a conversation, you start first.

You told narga that your boat got trapped in a storm and banged your head in the process, then waking up on the sure not knowing where you were.

Then you told him how you saw all the monsters and him almost stepping on you when he was hiding in the bushes, and how you followed him to his cave.

After finishing your story.
Narga laughed a little “you sure are very lucky Tyler, us kaiju don’t always watch where we plant are big feet, your lucky you weren’t crushed by mine” nerga let out laugh.

“Kaiju?” You thought.

“Excuse me narga but Exactly is a kaiju?” You ask him a question.

Narga stopped laughing and looked down at you, “I’m sorry what?”

You repeat the question.

“Oh...a kaiju is another word for giant monster, so for now on you can just call us kaiju’s”, narga answered your question.

You noted to now call these monsters kaiju.

“So about this island” nerga continued “it’s a special island, very big, very secluded, and it’s home to many giant monsters/kaiju” narga said.

“What do you call this island” you asked.

“This island has many names, such as The mysterious island, Monster land, Beast island, The island of beast, but we mostly call this island Monster island” narga said.

“Are the monsters/kaiju on this island friendly?” you ask again.

Narga responded “I’ll say half and half, half of the kaiju’s here are not very friendly towards humans or other kaiju’s for that matter”.

“Has there been other people/humans on this island before me” you ask again.

Nerga responded “there were many, most of the humans who wind up here are usually shipwrecked on the shores like you, or crash here by sky in your flying machine’s or what you call them”.

“Plane’s” you thought.

“Are there still humans on this island”

“I doubt it, humans who come here usually get eaten or stomped on, some even tried to swim off the island but they get attacked by the sea kaiju.

“Are you telling me there’s no way off of this Isl-“...you got erupted when narga yawned.

Narga yawned and stretched his limbs “I think it’s Time we get some sleep we have a big a day ahead of us”

You watch as the giant wyvern get to his usual sleep position lying on stomach head resting on his arms, legs outstretched.

You wanted to go to sleep to but you can’t sleep on the cold hard dirt ground, you looked at narga and dawn at his rump, his rump was soft and warm when you first Accoutered them there’ll make a perfect bed.

“Hey narga” you shouted

Narga opened his eyes “...huh?” He turned his head to look at you with sleepy eyes.

“Can I please sleep on your...well?...backside?

Narga was silent for a moment then spoke “you want to sleep on my butt?” Narga said a little confused “why would you wan-?...know what I’m to tired to care...go ahead, narga said as laid his head back down and went to sleep.

You were overjoyed when narga said yes, you quickly ran over to narga’s hip and climbed to the top and lay down on the soft, warm, furry, butt cheek of narga and fall asleep.

You wake in the morning or during the middle of the night.
1113311121.title: The two of you talk

15.content: Do you want a different monster, like something Mythical?
15.title: other

152.title: No

1521.content: How about Nargacuga from Monster hunter?
1521.title: Yes

choices: Stay and explore the rest of the island
15211.content: You stared in shock, as the giant monster appeared from the forest, it looked like some kind of feline a panther maybe?, Accept for the fact it had black scales, dark bluish fur, wings on it's arms, red eyes, pointy ears, a tail and a beak. You recognize the monster as the "Nargacuga" a wyvern from one of your favorite the video games "Monster hunter", as you examine him more, he looked slightly more humanoid his body shape was slim a little athletic, between his legs was his sheath and balls, the 200 foot tall giant Narga started to look around and sniff the air as you stayed hidden. As you watched him for at least a minute, you saw the giant Narga turn the other direction and start walking away, as he did so you saw the view of his tail swaying from side to side as he walked, but what got most of your attention was his impressively large rear. You couldn't help but blush as you watch his glutes jiggle with each step he took as he walked further away, "damn he's thicc" you blurted out, you thought about following him, but was it a good idea to chase after a giant beast like that?. there's was no telling what the Nargacuga could of done to you if he spotted you, you could stay and explore the rest of the island or you could follow after the Nargacuga, after a little time of thought you decide.
15211.title: Yes

1522.content: How about an anthro animal
1522.title: No

155.content: Nothing is coming, you venture into the forest or stay on the beach?
155.title: other

info.brief_description: A man washes ashore on a uncharted island populated by giant Monsters
info.description:
A young Man named Tyler, finds himself on a island that is populated by giant Monsters. Can Tyler avoid the monsters and get off the island alive or will he fall victim to the island’s monstrous inhabitants.

Include
---------------------------
OV
AV
CV
Butt crush
Stompage
Feet
M/f, M/m, F/f,
Digestion
-----------------------------
don't allow
No farting
or anything to gross.
No bad grammer.
No short chapters.
No muscle growth.
No herms.
No inflation
No Giant human's
No body swap
No weight gain
-----------------------------
Note. Tyler is a young man in his twenties, who a bit survival skills to help him survive the island.

The monsters can be from various species like for a example. Mythical, Sea monster's, dinosaur's, anthrofurs, Aliens, they can also be from video games, TV shows, or you can make up your own monster.

The monsters are giant, they have to be at least between100 to 400 feet tall.

Most of the monsters are hostile towards humans, but there are some that are friendly.

The monsters are anthropomorphic, they can be any body shape, muscular, skinny, fat, feminine,

The monsters can be male or female.

The mane protagonist can die but not to early.

Thats it, I will offer anyone 300 gps if you add or review my item.

This is my first story think you.
